languages.text: {n}Ваши слова встречают недоуменными взглядами. Даже Глейто рядом с вами, похоже, вызывает только замешательство.{/n}
{n}Your words are greeted with looks of bewilderment. Even the sight of Glaito standing at your side seems only to raise more questions.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваши слова встречают недоуменными взглядами. Даже Глейто рядом с вами, похоже, вызывает только замешательство.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your words are greeted with looks of bewilderment. Even the sight of Glaito standing at your side seems to only raise more questions.{/n}
{n}Your words are greeted with looks of bewilderment. Even the sight of Glaito standing at your side seems only to raise more questions.{/n}
{n}Your retinue turns to look at you in obvious bewilderment. The eyes fixed on you — or, more precisely, on Maive's body — are full of confusion or irritation.{/n}
{n}Your words are greeted with looks of bewilderment. Even the sight of Glaito standing at your side seems only to raise more questions.{/n}
{n}Your words are greeted with looks of bewilderment. Even the sight of Glaito standing at your side seems only to raise more questions.{/n}
{n}Your words are greeted with looks of bewilderment. Even the sight of Glaito standing at your side seems to only raise more questions.{/n}
{n}Your words are greeted with looks of bewilderment. Even the sight of Glaito standing at your side seems only to raise more questions.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的话让你的随行人员困惑不已。尽管格雷托也在你身边，但这似乎让他们更加一头雾水。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words are greeted with looks of bewilderment. Even the sight of Glaito standing at your side seems only to raise more questions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的话让你的随行人员困惑不已。尽管格雷托也在你身边，但这似乎让他们更加一头雾水。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tus palabras son recibidas con miradas de perplejidad. La presencia de Glaito a tu lado solo despierta más preguntas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words are greeted with looks of bewilderment. Even the sight of Glaito standing at your side seems only to raise more questions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus palabras son recibidas con miradas de perplejidad. La presencia de Glaito a tu lado solo despierta más preguntas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sözlerini şaşkın bakışlar karşılıyor. Hatta yanında duran Glaito'nun görüntüsü, insanların kafasında daha fazla soru işareti oluşturuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words are greeted with looks of bewilderment. Even the sight of Glaito standing at your side seems only to raise more questions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sözlerini şaşkın bakışlar karşılıyor. Hatta yanında duran Glaito'nun görüntüsü, insanların kafasında daha fazla soru işareti oluşturuyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの言葉に対して、困惑した視線が返ってくる。グライトがあなたのそばに立っている姿さえも、さらに多くの疑問を引き起こしているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words are greeted with looks of bewilderment. Even the sight of Glaito standing at your side seems only to raise more questions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの言葉に対して、困惑した視線が返ってくる。グライトがあなたのそばに立っている姿さえも、さらに多くの疑問を引き起こしているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un silence effaré plane à la suite de votre déclaration. La présence de Glaito à vos côtés ne semble que soulever davantage de questions.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words are greeted with looks of bewilderment. Even the sight of Glaito standing at your side seems only to raise more questions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un silence effaré plane à la suite de votre déclaration. La présence de Glaito à vos côtés ne semble que soulever davantage de questions.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Worte stoßen auf verwirrte Blicke. Selbst der neben dir stehende Glaito scheint nur nur noch mehr Fragen aufzuwerfen.{/n}
